ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! Do not obey him, but prostrate and draw near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Beware! Do not obey him, but bow in adoration and draw near (to your Lord).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No, not at all. Never obey him. But prostrate yourself and become nigh (to your Lord).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), never yield to him! Prostrate yourself and try to come closer to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Yes indeed; do not listen to him – and prostrate, and become close to Us. (Command of Prostration # 14)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! Do not obey him. Fall prostrate and draw near (to Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! obey him not, and make obeisance and draw nigh (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; do thou not obey him, and bow thyself, and draw nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, Obey not thou him. But prostrate thyself, and draw near (unto Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No indeed! Do not obey him, but prostrate yourself and come closer to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means! Obey not thou him. Continue to adore, and continue to draw nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed! Do not obey him, but prostrate and draw near [to Allah]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, heed him not: But bow down in adoration, and bring thyself the closer (to Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him))! Do not obey him (Abu Jahl). Fall prostrate and draw near to Allah!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, indeed; do not obey him! Prostrate and come nearer (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No, do not obey him; but kneel down, and come near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:19] No indeed! — a repudiation of him — Do not obey him, O Muhammad (s) and abandon prayer, and prostrate yourself, perform prayer to God, and draw near, to Him through obedience to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) truly, Muhammad! (Obey not thou him) i.e. obey not Abu Jahl when he wants you not to pray to your Lord. (But prostrate thyself) to your Lord, (and draw near (unto Allah)) through prostration. And of the surah in which Power is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 5 verses, 30 words and 121 letters: 765 Surah 97: Power (al-Qadr) And of the surah in which Power is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 5 verses, 30 words and 121 letters:
